review:
Dr., Did angio at global hospital. Advised byepass surgery and Dr.Anto did the surgery on 5th Aug. 21. 1st review was on 14th, suiture removed. I was advised to take medicine prescribed and to apply ointment for the wounds. After 3months I was advised to take appointment with Dr.Karthik for review. I am doing as advised. I use to take BP reading every day morning. I found my BP High inspite of taking tablet both morning and evening. I have no way to contact or inform Dr. Today I asked for appointment and am given Thursday 12.30pm to meet Dr.Karthik.
I feel stressed. Expect my Cardiologist to provide atleast a direct communication so as to enable his patients like me to get relieved and to have a moral support. I pray the Almighty to have my High BP tension gets solved. Thank you for this facility to express my feelings

Had taken my friend to ER when he had heart attack. Dr Karthik assessed the criticality of my friend and saved his life by quickly doing the angioplasty procedures. Very sincere and quick decision making Doctor!! Have high regards for him

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: Doctor is very polite and patient in explaining the issue, pre and post angiography/ angioplasty procedures

Thanks You Dr Karthik for a successful stent procedure to Mr. Narayan yesterday (28th May). Well managed and executed. Great Thanks and God bless you. Well composed and soft spoken Dr. Brilliant efforts.
